verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Maschil. Blessed <WH835> is he whose transgression <WH6588> is forgiven <WH5375>, Whose sin <WH2401> is covered <WH3680>.
Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH120> unto whom Jehovah <WH3068> imputeth <WH2803> not iniquity <WH5771>, And in whose spirit <WH7307> there is no guile <WH7423>.
When I kept silence <WH2790>, my bones <WH6106> wasted away <WH1086> Through my groaning <WH7581> all the day long <WH3117>.
For day <WH3119> and night <WH3915> thy hand <WH3027> was heavy <WH3513> upon me <WH3955>: My moisture was changed <WH2015> as with the drought <WH2725> of summer <WH7019>. <WH5542>[[Selah

I acknowledged <WH3045> my sin <WH2403> unto thee <WH5771>, And mine iniquity did I not hide <WH3680>: I said <WH559>, I will confess <WH3034> my transgressions <WH6588> unto Jehovah <WH3068>; And thou forgavest <WH5375> the iniquity <WH5771> of my sin <WH2403>. <WH5542>[[Selah

For this let every one that is godly <WH2623> pray <WH6419> unto thee in a time <WH6256> when thou mayest be found <WH4672>: Surely when the great <WH7227> waters <WH4325> overflow <WH7858> they shall not reach unto him <WH5060>.
Thou art my hiding-place <WH5643>; Thou wilt preserve <WH5341> me from trouble <WH6862>; Thou wilt compass <WH5437> me about with songs <WH7438> of deliverance <WH6405>. <WH5542>[[Selah
I will instruct <WH7919> thee and teach <WH3384> thee in the way <WH1870> which <WH2098> thou shalt go <WH3212>: I will counsel <WH3289> thee with mine eye upon thee <WH5869>.

Be ye not as the horse <WH5483>, or as the mule <WH6505>, which have no understanding <WH995>; Whose trappings <WH5716> must be bit <WH4964> and bridle <WH7448> to hold <WH1102> them in <WH1077>, Else they will not come near unto thee <WH7126>.
Many <WH7227> sorrows <WH4341> shall be to the wicked <WH7563>; But he that trusteth <WH982> in Jehovah <WH3068>, lovingkindness <WH2617> shall compass him about <WH5437>.
Be glad <WH8055> in Jehovah <WH3068>, and rejoice <WH1523>, ye righteous <WH6662>; And shout <WH7442> for joy <WH3477>, all ye that are upright in heart <WH3820>.
